price: 74. Badanaa intaan halaagnay hortood fac, oo ka hanti, alaab iyo arag wanaagsanaa?.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari'yan
